physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man standing with his legs crossed. He is wearing a shirt that is tucked into his shorts. He is drinking a dark liquid from a bottle. To his right, there are three more bottles with the same liquid, as well as a large cup and an empty bottle. The background of the photograph shows greenery.
title_text: Sjt (Sgt) Grisley-Grey drinking beer from a bottle Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Drinking of alcoholic beverages Soldiers
